rank_description: Прегледайте Вашата или на някой друг Rank Card-а в дадения сървър.
id_description: Прегледайте Вашата или на някой друг Rank Card-а в дадения сървър.
profile_description: Вижте вашата или чужда персонализирана лична карта за глобален профил.
user_description: Показва информация, като ID и дата на присъединяване, за вас или потребител.
avatar_description: Покажи профилната снимка на друг член
roles_description: Get a list of server roles and member counts.
blacklisted_call_dramex: Вашият профил е в черният списък поради съмнителни действия, моля свържете се с @Dramex#0001 за повече информация.
blacklisted_title: Вашият профил е бил в черният списък за съмнителни действия. Моля разрешете the captha за да продължите!
blacklisted_note: Това е еднократен билет, не го губете.
24/7_description: Превключете режима 24/7. Това кара ботът да не напуска гласовия канал, докато не го спрете.
top_description: Покажете водещите членове чрез текст или глас.
mute_description: Заглушава член от текстовите канали, така че той не може да пише.
vmute_description: Заглушава член от гласов канал, така че да не може да говори
unvmute_description: Премахва заглушаването на член от гласови канали.
untimeout_description: Removes a timeout from a member.
move_description: Moves a member to another voice channel.
setcolor_description: Променя цвета на роли по "HEX" код
warnings_description: Get the list of warnings for the server or a user.
setnick_description: Changes the nickname of a member.
play_description: Add a song to queue and plays it.
queue_description: Показва опашката на текущите записи в плейлиста.
stop_description: Stop the current song and clears the entire music queue.
np_description: Показва текущата песен, която бота пуска
seek_description: Seeks to a certain point in the current track.
credits_description: Показва вашия Баланс, Или на Някой друг
color_description: Change your color on the server.
colors_description: Lists you all the available colors.
title_description: Changes your title in the `#profile` command.
reset_description: Reset text/voice/invites xp points for all or specific members.
rep_description: Award someone a reputation point. Can only be used once every 24 hours.
vip_description: Displays info about your premium bot.
points_description: A server based points that can be given by moderators.
slowmode_description: Enable or disable slowmode on a channel.
vip_owner_only: Protection is only for the owner.
ROLES_MAX_LIMIT: Ролите могат да пропуснат максималния лимит
MAX_LIMIT_NO_SKIP: Максималния лимит не може да бъде пропуснат
NO_TIME_ACTION: Действие, ако времето не е посочено
AUTO_DELETE_REPLY: Автоматично изтриване на отговора на бота e след 5 секунди
WELCOME_MESSAGE: Изпраща Съобщение, когато Член се Присъедини към сървъра
LEAVE_MESSAGE: Send a message when a user leaves the server
WELCOME_IMAGE: Изпраща Снимка, когато член се Присъедини
EDIT_IT_USING_MOUSE: Можете да Използвате Мишката за да Го редактирате
probot_mods: Команда От Модерацията е Била Използвана
voice_joined: Член Се Присъедини Към Гласов Канал
voice_switched: Член се превключи между Гласовите Канали
voice_move: Member moved to another voice channel
message_on_link_request: Съобщение за изпращане до сървъра, когато връзката се изисква
message_on_link_field: Съобщение за изпращане до сървъра, когато връзката не може да бъде изпратена
link_default_channel: Покани чрез Линкове в канал по Подразбиране
link_limit: Колко Линка трябват да бъдат изисквани, преди времето за Изчакване
link_wait_message: Съобщение за изпращане за сървър с Бреме за Изчакване
link_invite_permission: Всеки които има Правото да Кани членове
link_auto_delete: Авто-изтриване на съобщението изпратено от Бота И члена
ACTION_IF_ROLE: Действие, ако Лимитът за роли е Достигнат
ACTION_IF_CHANNELS: Действие, ако Лимитът за канали е Достигнат
ACTION_IF_KICK: Действие, ако Лимитът за изритване е Достигнат
ACTION_IF_BAN: Действие, ако Лимитът за ограничаване е Достигнат
PERMISSIONS_ALL: Премахва всички Административни Разрешения от всички роли
PERMISSIONS_USER: Премахва всички Административни Разрешения от всички Роли, които Членове Притежават
REMOVE_ROLES: Премахва Членът, от всички Административни роли
PROTECTED_HINT: Препоръчително е да добавите %EVERYONE% с Авто-ролята
ACTION_WHEN_PROTECTED: Action when protected role is updated/deleted
UNDO_REMOVE_ALL: Отменя Действието + Премахва всички роли с Административни Разрешения
PROTECT_BOT_JOINED: Действие, когато бот се присъедини в сървъра
REMOVE_ADMIN_BOT: Remove all administrative roles from the bot
BOTS_HINT: Това ще предпази сървъра ви от неизвестни ботове
DELETE_WITH_MESSAGE_DELETION: Автоматично изтриване с изтриване на съобщение
AUTOMOD_SPAM: СПАМ (5 съобщения в рамките на 5 Секунди)
LOGOUT_CONFIRM: Сигурни ли сте че искате да Излезете От профила си?
BOT_GIVEN_A_ROLE: Action when another bot is given an administrative role
USE_COMMA: Use a comma to separate them
GUILD_UPDATE_ACTION: Action when server name/icon has been changed
PROTECTION_ACCESS: Who can access ProBot control panel
PROTECTION_ACCESS_MEMBERS: Owner + Specific members with Administrator permission
PROTECTION_ONLY_OWNER: Restrict protection properties to the owner of the server
AUTO_ROLES_NOTE: By community request, AutoRole only works if the role does not have administrative permissions.
CHANNELS_LIMIT_HINT: This limit will apply to channel create/update/delete events.
ROLE_LIMIT_HINT: This limit will apply to role create/update/delete events.
index_feature_1_description: Give your new members a heartwarming welcome with our ready-to-use and fully customizable designs
index_feature_2_description: Detect and take automatic actions upon server raids
index_feature_3_description: Let the bot respond to any trigger words
index_feature_4_description: A highly advanced automod system that detects bad behaviors and takes action on them
index_feature_5_description: ProBot now supports more than 30 languages!
index_feature_6_description: No need to worry about downtimes, ProBot is online!
why_probot_text: A very customizable multipurpose bot for welcome image, In-depth logs, Social commands, Music, Moderation and many more ...
undone_unrefund: This action can not be undone / refund.
index_card1_description: ProBot lets you design your own welcome images that includes user's avatar and username with a customizable background image!
index_card2_description: Be more creative with ProBot and send embeds in any channel, anytime! We let you preview the embeds before you send them. You can also edit your embeds anytime in future!
index_card3_description: Enhance the experience of your Discord server members with ProBot's text and voice chatting levels!
index_card4_description: Manage your Discord server in more advanced ways with plenty of useful and essential moderation commands!
index_card5_description: DON'T MISS A BEAT! Listen to the music you GREW up with!
protection_autorole_removeall: Remove all administrative permissions when the AutoRole gets deleted (This protects you from the discord prune button)
tos_content:
The terms and conditions of our site serve as a guide for clients to show them how to use our site and how to use its services with ease.


#First: General conditions for ProBot site: -
1- All the terms and conditions mentioned on this page are applied to all users of the site.
2 - Once the client is registered on our site, it means that he completely agrees with the terms and conditions mentioned on this page and any terms that may be added in the future.
3 - All clients must certify that the personal data they provide to us is correct so that they can register on the site and get its services.
4 - We welcome the inquiries of all clients, and our technical support staff is ready to answer all inquiries of clients throughout the day.
5 - It is possible for us to change the terms and conditions at any time or add new ones, so we kindly ask clients to see them from time to time to be aware of any new terms that have been added.


#Second: Terms of Use of ProBot Website: -
1. The clients should provide us with all required information and data and it must be 100% accurate.
2. The site is not responsible for any damage caused to the client as a result of misuse of our site or a sudden failure of our site.
3. It is forbidden to sell subscriptions to other people. Only the client has the right to use the bots.
4. It is prohibited to use our services for unauthorized commercial use.
5- The user assures that his use of bots will not harm our site and will not violate the terms and conditions of our site.
6- The user assures that he is responsible for any violation issued from him, and he is responsible for this violation.
7- The administration of our site disclaims the responsibility for any damage or losses to the client as a result of his misuse of our site.
8- Our administration has the right to stop the subscription or account of a participant if he violates the terms and conditions of our site.

9- It is forbidden to deal outside the site, and any transactions must be done within the site so as not to occur any kind of fraud and cheating on clients.
10- It is forbidden to use our services against law or cause harm to our site or to any other person.

#It is forbidden to use or reuse, copy or paste the services or content that existed on the site of ProBot, and everything that exists on the site of ProBot is owned by the site alone, and any person who violates these conditions, will expose himself or his company or his site or his application for liability and prosecution by the administration of the site.
pp_content:
We thank our dear clients for reading our privacy policy page. We assure to our clients that their personal data and information will be completely secure on our site, because we are responsible for maintaining these data and we seek in every way to preserve them. Our privacy policy page includes some items as follows:

1- Data and information that we request from our clients:

ProBot site requests some data and information from the clients in order to be able to register on our site and use its services for example our site requests client's e-mail, his name and phone number and he should make a password for his account on our site and other information may be requested by our site.

2- The client's responsibility on our site:

The client is responsible for the safety of his account on our site. He should not provide anyone with sensitive information about his account such as giving someone the password of his account, which causes some damage to the client account. We advise our clients do not give any private information to other people.

3- How we protect our clients' data in our site:-

Our site follows the best procedures globally to protect our clients' personal data and information. Our site ensures to all clients that their data will be secure with us. Our site complies with the requirements of the European Union to protect the client data (GDPR).

: - 4- Client's financial rights in our site

Our site administration is keen on the financial rights of the clients. The balance will only appear to the client in the orders page. Our site will not provide anyone with the financial data of the clients

5- The uses of our site for clients' data: -

Our site uses the client data only to provide their services to them, when we obtain useful information to the site and develop its services. When we respond to the client inquiries, and when we carry out purchases.

6. We follow the European Union requirements to protect our client data:

The European Union has created a law that greatly helps to protect the client data. We work in all ways to preserve client data. This law allows to all clients to delete or modify their data when it occurs a breach of this data, and our site must report this breach within 72 hours of its occurrence.

7- Our site rights:-

Our site has the complete right to modify any item of its privacy policy page or add some new items to it in any time if our administrator sees that it is necessary to do this, so our dear clients, you should take a look from time to time to our privacy policy page to be aware off any changes made upon our privacy policy page.

8. Copyright of our site: -

It is strictly forbidden to copy or paste, use or reuse anything related to ProBot site, Any content existed in this site is belonged only to ProBot site. Any person copies, pastes, or uses any content or services of a ProBot site; he will expose himself or his site or his company to liability and prosecution by the administration of the site.
rp_content:
We guarantee to all clients that the replacement and refund process will be done easily with us; we work hard to satisfy all our dear clients. The clients can request a replacement service or refund within 7 days of the date of purchase with a condition that:
1- The replacement and refund process can only carry out to the person who bought the services from us.
2- The purchase must be confirmed by clarifying the order number and invoice.
3- When the client requests a replacement, he must not have used the purchased bots.
logout_all: Sign out from all active devices
title: ProBot - Bot for Discord
lock_description: Disables @everyone from sending messages in specific channel.
unlock_description: Allows @everyone to send messages in specific channel.
name_of_user: Displays the user's name, without pinging the user.
link_onorder: ** The link was sent to your DM **
link_onlink:
Link ends in: ** 1 day **
Link can be used: ** 3 times **
link_onfiald: ** I couldn't send a DM to you. Check your privacy settings **
link_waittext:
** You must wait 6 hours before requesting a new link 
 ⏰[time] **
leveling_note: * To avoid spamming users get random amount of xp each minute while chatting
leveling_variables:
[level] - to print given level
[user] - to ping the user
[user.name] - to print user name
[user.tag] - to bring user tag

mod_want_delete_action: Do you really want to delete this action
rr_toggle_desc: This type adds/removes the roles depending on whether the user has the roles. RECOMMENDED!
rr_give_desc: This type adds the roles whenever a reaction is added/removed. Good for accepting rules!
rr_take_desc: This type removes the roles whenever a reaction is added/removed.

premium_index_2: Imagine your current Discord server, Just 10 times clear and easier for members to interact, Socialize and play.

reset_settings_embed_no_effect: Embed messages will not be affected
role_under_position: ProBot should be in a role with higher position
AUTOMOD_SPAM_INFO: Detect when a user sends over 5 messages in 5 seconds.
AUTOMOD_BADWORDS_INFO: Detect if the message contains a bad word.
AUTOMOD_DUPS_INFO: Detect if the message has repeated text & lines like SPAM SPAM SPAM SPAM.
AUTOMOD_REPEATED_INFO: Detect whether the message is sent more than once from the same user.
AUTOMOD_DISCORD_INVITES_INFO: Detect if the message contains a discord invitation link.
AUTOMOD_LINKS_INFO: Detect if the message contains a link.
AUTOMOD_CAPS_INFO: Detect if the message was sent with caps like: HELLO THIS IS PROBOT.
AUTOMOD_EMOJI_SPAM_INFO: Detect if the message contains 8 emojis or more.
AUTOMOD_MASS_MENTION_INFO: Detect if the message contains a mass amount of mentions (different users per mention).
protection_roles_adminstrative: ProBot ще попречи на тези роли да имат административни разрешения чрез премахване на разрешенията, когато са дадени.
protection_role_access: ProBot ще предотврати даването/премахването на тези роли от други членове.
billing_no_valid_code_number: Моля, въведете валиден номер на карта!
billing_no_expiry_date: Моля, въведете валидна дата на изтичане.
protection_limits_tip: Ако някой има повече от една роля, ще се прилагат по-високите граници. @everyone е ролята по подразбиране за всички.
autorole_specific_invite: Присвояване на роля на конкретна покана!
premium_invite_required: You have to invite the premium bot to get access to premium features
